name: Innerspin
description: Innerspin is a full service creative company based in Los Angeles focused on growing global brands through our strategic brand building and digital capabilities. We look for ideas designed to inspire, amplify and connect at a whole new level. We get technology. In the ever-changing, always advancing marketplace, we must be ahead of the curve. We offer engaging, consumer facing, integrated online experiences that motivate the consumer and deliver measurable business results.
